name: zk-lending-circom
description: Circom DSL implementation for ZK comparison

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/collateral.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/collateral_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/collateral_0000.zkey build/collateral_final.zkey --name="First contribution" -v
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/collateral_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/collateral_final.zkey build/witness.wtns build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
scripts.generate-verifier: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/collateral_final.zkey contracts/CollateralVerifier.sol
